circumstances: Vehicle stop; officers claimed he hit and dragged officer; crashed and died at hospital
notes: Silverio Villegas Gonzalez, 38-year-old Mexico national shot by ICE agent during traffic stop in Franklin Park, IL. Officers claimed he hit and dragged officer; crashed and died at hospital. Dashcam footage disputed by family attorneys. No weapon found in vehicle. Leaves behind wife and 3 children. DOJ civil rights investigation opened. Part of 27+ shootings by immigration agents since Jan 20, 2025 (8 fatal).
jurisdiction_notes: Chicago suburb under Illinois TRUST Act.

circumstances: Teaching assistant warning residents about raids; shot in shoulder; charges dismissed after video showed agents rammed her vehicle
notes: Marimar Martinez, 30-year-old US citizen shot by CBP agent. Agent: Charles Exum. Teaching assistant warning residents about raids; shot in shoulder; charges dismissed after video showed agents rammed her vehicle. Outcome: injury. Part of 27+ shootings by immigration agents since Jan 20, 2025 (8 fatal). Many involve firing into vehicles.
jurisdiction_notes: Welcoming City Ordinance. Site of numerous 2025 enforcement operations.

circumstances: Coordinated attack on ICE facility; officer shot in neck; 18 arrested; 7 pled guilty to terrorism
notes: Attack on ICE/CBP: Police officer (unnamed). Perpetrator: civilian. Coordinated attack on ICE facility; officer shot in neck; 18 arrested; 7 pled guilty to terrorism. Outcome: injury. Part of 27+ shootings by immigration agents since Jan 20, 2025 (8 fatal). Many involve firing into vehicles.

circumstances: Sniper fired from rooftop into sally port; 'ANTI-ICE' markings on ammunition; 2 killed, 1 injured
notes: Attack on ICE/CBP: Norlan Guzman-Fuentes (37) + 1 other detainee. Perpetrator: Joshua Jahn (sniper). Sniper fired from rooftop into sally port; 'ANTI-ICE' markings on ammunition; 2 killed, 1 injured. Outcome: death. Part of 27+ shootings by immigration agents since Jan 20, 2025 (8 fatal). circumstances: Fired dozens of shots at agents exiting facility; mental health issues claimed
notes: Attack on ICE/CBP: 3 Border Patrol agents. Perpetrator: Ryan Louis Mosqueda (27). Fired dozens of shots at agents exiting facility; mental health issues claimed. Outcome: injury. Part of 27+ shootings by immigration agents since Jan 20, 2025 (8 fatal). Many involve firing into vehicles.

outcome: Shot during foot pursuit near border, survived
notes: Shot in leg during foot pursuit after crossing border. Agent claimed he was carrying a weapon; no weapon recovered. Hospitalized, then detained. CBP/ICE joint operation. Excessive force lawsuit filed.
outcome_detail: Shot during foot pursuit near border, survived
jurisdiction_notes: Border city with heavy CBP/ICE presence.

outcome: Shot during home raid, critical condition
notes: Shot during pre-dawn raid at residence. ICE claims he lunged at agents. Wife present during shooting. Shot twice in torso. Survived after emergency surgery. Home security camera footage under subpoena.
outcome_detail: Shot during home raid, critical condition
jurisdiction_notes: Inland Empire. Under California Values Act.

circumstances: Shot from behind in right shoulder at 6:30 AM traffic stop. Attorneys say he stopped to alert agents about children at nearby bus stop, then began backing up to leave when shot. Bullet remains lodged in body.
notes: US citizen father of three, local food bank worker. Shot from behind. Bullet remains lodged in body. Released from hospital into federal custody. Indicted for assault on federal officer using vehicle. Trial scheduled April 13, 2026. Congresswoman Norma Torres demanded accountability.
jurisdiction_notes: Inland Empire, San Bernardino County. Under California Values Act.

circumstances: Shot on New Year's Eve by off-duty ICE agent. DHS claims he was firing celebratory shots; family disputes account.
notes: US citizen, father of two. Shot on New Year's Eve allegedly while firing celebratory shots. Family disputes DHS account. Off-duty ICE agent Palacios identified as shooter.
jurisdiction_notes: LA neighborhood. Under California Values Act.

victim_occupation: ICU nurse at Minneapolis VA hospital
outcome: US citizen ICU nurse killed by Border Patrol agent
outcome_detail: Alex Pretti, 37-year-old American ICU nurse at Minneapolis VA hospital, shot and killed by Border Patrol agents. Video showed Pretti filming agents with phone and directing traffic. Stood between agent and woman pushed to ground. Pepper-sprayed, wrestled to ground by several agents, then shot 10 times over 5 seconds. Agents yelled about gun ~8 seconds after Pretti pinned. Video reviewed by Reuters and WSJ appeared to show agent removing gun and moving away <1 second before another agent fired.
notes: EXHAUSTIVE: Second US citizen killed during Operation Metro Surge. Pretti was AFGE member, had active nursing license, Minnesota permit to carry, no serious criminal history (only traffic tickets). DHS alleged Pretti approached with 9mm and 'violently resisted'; local officials disputed. Two witnesses gave sworn testimony Pretti did not brandish gun. Video showed phone in right hand, nothing in left. Mayor Frey: only 3 homicides in Minneapolis in 2026 so far, 2 were by federal agents. Minnesota National Guard activated. Judge granted restraining order against DHS. Third federal agent shooting in <3 weeks.
jurisdiction_notes: DOJ investigation opened Jan 2026 into Mayor Frey. Site of Operation Tidal Wave with 2000+ federal officers.
